## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added or updated
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Code formatted (`ruff format`)
- [ ] Linting passing (`ruff check`)
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Core remains DB-agnostic (if applicable)
- [ ] No business logic in adapters (if applicable)
